season_notes.kharif_harvest: peaks Dec — Kharif arrivals Nov-Jan glut → price dip
season_notes.lean_kharif: peaks Aug — pre-Kharif stock depletion → price HIGH
season_notes.lean_inter: peaks Feb — between seasons → price firm
season_notes.harvest_rain_risk: peaks Oct-Nov — excess rain = aflatoxin risk
season_notes.oil_demand_kharif: peaks Nov — edible oil crushing season
season_notes.lag_90: extra 90-day lag — groundnut stored months, longer memory
